conbody.p: A Triple'A Plus Core format is the output structure where a Triple'A Plus Core financial function stores its results.
This structure can be seen as a contract between the front-end and the Triple'A Plus Core financial server for displaying data.

A format is defined in Triple'A Plus Core only, using the Triple'A Plus Core GUI. Any format can be imported into Design Studio. It becomes a class in the domain model in the Triple'A Plus Web packaging project. These classes cannot be edited as Triple'A Plus Core is the only source where formats can be managed.
